description: Smallest prime p such that first n primes (p_1=2, ..., p_n) are 13th power residues mod p.
comments: No more terms through 10^11. - Don Reble (djr(AT)nk.ca), Oct 12 2001
references: A. E. Western and J. C. P. Miller, Tables of Indices and Primitive Roots. Royal Society Mathematical Tables, Vol. 9, Cambridge Univ. Press, 1968, p. XXIV.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 03 2001
extensions: More terms from Don Reble (djr(AT)nk.ca), Oct 12 2001
